snippet.title: How Do You Build 4D Worlds? - 4D Golf Devlog #3
snippet.description:
Modeling 4D objects and drawing them to the screen is obviously one of the hardest problems with making a 4D game.  In this Devlog, I go into the implementation detail of how I achieved this in my project and some of the amazing algorithms that got me there.

Wishlist 4D Golf on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147950
#4dgolf 

Great video about 4D shapes: https://youtu.be/ctv0qa-eFsM
Miratope (GitHub): https://github.com/galoomba1/miratope-rs

Devlog #1: https://youtu.be/by8eAnez0i8
Trailer: https://youtu.be/1ad9y0FmQ9g

Support me and innovative projects like these!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/codeparade

Merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/codeparade

Koi-discovery - Chromatismus
